intro: Kyllinga planiculmis, commonly known as the flat-leaf spikerush, is a herbaceous plant belonging to the Cyperaceae family. It is characterized by its grass-like appearance, with narrow, flat leaves and small, clustered flowers. The plant typically grows in wet or marshy environments, thriving in moist soils. Its structure includes a rhizomatous root system that aids in its spread and survival. Kyllinga planiculmis plays a role in stabilizing soil and providing habitat for various small organisms.
